alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:07PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 307 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Craig Field, or near Arlington. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Unf, Ponte Vedra Beach, Arlington, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows, Mayport, Craig Field and San Pablo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River
